properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 41800
| extend Endpoint = extract("param2=\"([^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    ["User Name"] = user,
    ["Endpoint"] = Endpoint,
    MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: Attempt to Delete Backup Failed
properties.description: Detects failed backup operations. This might indicate system or storage issues, or a potential sabotage of the backup infrastructure.
